long_description: for more than 30 years project associates has been providing engineering services in the evansville, in area. initially, our primary focus was electrical engineering, design and drafting for local industrial clients. as our expertise and experience grew we enjoyed steady growth and diversification, adding experienced staff in the fields of mechanical, piping, hvac, automation, chemical, structural, and architectural design. we have worked hard to develop long-term partnering relationships with well-established industrial clients, and we are proud of the fact that we continue to perform engineering and design services for our first customer. employees at project associates are dedicated to providing quality work, completed according to the client's schedule, and providing our expertise for a reasonable cost. we look forward to an opportunity to demonstrate our capabilities for you. project associates has a staff of over one-hundred employees, including sixty-one engineers in the various disciplines. twenty-five of our engineers are registered pe's holding licenses in the states of indiana, illinois, kentucky, michigan, tennessee, texas, california and nineteen other states. in addition to our full time staff, project associates has working relationships with engineers on a sub-contract basis that can provide specialized experience & expertise in additional fields on an as-needed basis. project associates has two locations. our headquaters are located in evansville, indiana. a satellite offfice is located in alcoa tennessee.
